title: font management for Windows 7 and Windows Vista
content:
What are the best font management tools for windows 7 and windows vista?

thanks:-)

alex
author: alexfjelldal

comments.content:
Personally, I think the recently released Suitcase Fusion 2 for Windows is the way to go. I spent a lot of time looking for an adequate font manager for Windows, and this is the best I've used.

Matty
